//Auto-generated blank response for padding out InfoRemarkables
Response _PlayerInfoRemarkableBlankManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/blank.vcd"
}

Response C6M3PlayerNiceShotManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/NiceShot01.vcd"  //Nice shot!
	scene "scenes/Manager/NiceShot02.vcd" odds 5 //Oh man, great shot.
	scene "scenes/Manager/NiceShot03.vcd" odds 2 //Wooo, nice baby!
	scene "scenes/Manager/NiceShot04.vcd"  //Whoah. Nice shot.
	scene "scenes/Manager/NiceShot05.vcd"  //Nice one!
	scene "scenes/Manager/NiceShot07.vcd"  //Nice shot!
	scene "scenes/Manager/NiceShot08.vcd"  //Great shot!
	scene "scenes/Manager/NiceShot09.vcd"  //POW!
	scene "scenes/Manager/NiceShot10.vcd"  //Oh, HELL yes.
}
Rule C6M3PlayerNiceShotManager
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerNiceShot IsNotCoughing IsManager IssuerNotSoClose IsC6M3_Port IsTalk IsTalkManager IsWorldTalkManager IsNotSpeaking ChanceToFire70Percent
	Response C6M3PlayerNiceShotManager
}

Rule PlayerNiceShotManager
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerNiceShot IsNotCoughing IsManager IssuerClose IsTalk IsTalkManager IsWorldTalkManager IsNotSpeaking ChanceToFire30Percent
	Response C6M3PlayerNiceShotManager
}

Response L4D1HealThanksManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/Thanks03.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" then Subject YouAreWelcome foo:0 -0.675 //Thanks, I owe you one.
	scene "scenes/Manager/Thanks08.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" then Subject YouAreWelcome foo:0 -0.675 //Thanks, I owe ya a big one.
	scene "scenes/Manager/Thanks09.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" then Subject YouAreWelcome foo:0 -0.675 //Thanks a lot.
	scene "scenes/Manager/Thanks10.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" then Subject YouAreWelcome foo:0 0.3 //Whoo, thanks.
	scene "scenes/Manager/Thanks12.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" odds 1 then Subject YouAreWelcome foo:0 0.3 //Thanks Dog
	scene "scenes/Manager/Thanks14.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" odds 1 then Subject YouAreWelcome foo:0 -0.864 //Thanks, Playa.
}
Rule L4D1HealThanksManager
{
	criteria ConceptHealedByFriend IsNotCoughing IsManager IsTalk IsTalkManager SubjectIsNotManager IsWorldTalkManager
	ApplyContext "TalkManager:1:2"
	Response L4D1HealThanksManager
}

Rule L4D1ReviveThanksManager
{
	criteria ConceptRevivedByFriend IsNotCoughing  IsManager
	ApplyContext "TalkManager:1:2"
	Response L4D1HealThanksManager
}

	scene "scenes/Manager/Taunt06.vcd"  //Helll yeah, Hell yeah!
}

	scene "scenes/Manager/YouAreWelcome07.vcd" predelay "1,3.5" //Sure.

	scene "scenes/Manager/YouAreWelcome09.vcd" predelay "1,3.5" //Hey, no problem.

	scene "scenes/Manager/YouAreWelcome13.vcd" predelay "1,3.5" //Hey, man, no problem.
	scene "scenes/Manager/YouAreWelcome14.vcd" predelay "1,3.5" //Not a problem.
	scene "scenes/Manager/YouAreWelcome15.vcd" predelay "1,3.5" //You are totally welcome.

{

	scene "scenes/Manager/Yes02.vcd" predelay "1,3.5" //Yeah.

	scene "scenes/Manager/Yes07.vcd" predelay "1,3.5" //Yeah, I'm cool with that
	scene "scenes/Manager/Yes08.vcd" predelay "1,3.5" //Yes
	scene "scenes/Manager/Yes09.vcd" predelay "1,3.5" //Cool
}

{
	criteria ConceptSurvivorBotReassureComing IsNotCoughing  IsManager IsTalk IsTalkManager IsWorldTalkManager IsNotSpeaking
	Response L4D1BotReassureComingManager
}

Response C7M3SafeRoomManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3SECONDSAFEROOM01.vcd"  then Any C7M3_saferoom001 foo:0 .1 //Never thought I'd be happy to be heading to a deserted island.
	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3SECONDSAFEROOM02.vcd"  then Any C7M3_saferoom002 foo:0 .1 //You know, I didn't like the idea of a deserted island at first. But I'm startin' to get a good feeling about this.
	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3SECONDSAFEROOM03.vcd"  then Any C7M3_saferoom002 foo:0 .1 //You know, I didn't like the idea of a deserted island at first. But I'm startin' to get a good feeling about this.
	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3SECONDSAFEROOM04.vcd"  then Any C7M3_saferoom003 foo:0 .1 //You know what I miss?  Checking email.  Seeing what's new.
	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3SECONDSAFEROOM08.vcd"  then Self C7M3_saferoom004 foo:0 .1 //One thing I'm not gonna miss about civilization? I.T. I will never have to tell another human being to reboot their damn computer.
	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3SECONDSAFEROOM13.vcd"  then Any C7M3_saferoom005 foo:0 .1 //Hey, Zoey. We're actually headed to an island. Top ten desert island movies. Go.
	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3SECONDSAFEROOM14.vcd"  then Any C7M3_saferoom006 foo:0 .1 //So, Bill. Once we find a sailboat, how far is it to the Florida Keys?
	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3SECONDSAFEROOM16.vcd"  then Any C7M3_saferoom007 foo:0 .1 //So... once we're on a boat...  can zombies swim?
	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3SECONDSAFEROOM19.vcd"  then Any C7M3_saferoom009 foo:0 .1 //Bill, when we get to the keys, you got an island in mind?
	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3SECONDSAFEROOM21.vcd"  then Any C7M3_saferoom010 foo:0 .1 //Bill, when we get to the keys, you know how to fish?
	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3SECONDSAFEROOM25.vcd"  then Any C7M3_saferoom013 foo:0 .1 //Francis, what's the first thing you're gonna do when we get to the island?
	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3SECONDSAFEROOM28.vcd"  then Any C7M3_saferoom014 foo:0 .1 //Francis, you ready to get to the keys and have ourselves a seafood feast?
	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3SECONDSAFEROOM30.vcd"  then Any C7M3_saferoom015 foo:0 .1 //Once we get to the keys, I'm gonna teach you how to swim Francis.
	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3SECONDSAFEROOM33.vcd"  then Any C7M3_saferoom016 foo:0 .1 //Everybody ready to go live on an island in paradise? Man, I cannot wait!
}
Rule C7M3SafeRoomManager
{
	criteria ConceptTalkIdle IsManager NotInCombat IsMapc7m3_port IsInStartArea IsNotAlone AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival _auto_IsSafeRoomStart _auto_NotSafeRoomQuiet IsNotSaidLeavingSafeArea IsNotSpeakingWeight0
	ApplyContext "_auto_SafeRoomStart:2:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response C7M3SafeRoomManager
}


//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Call For Rescue
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Response L4D1PlayerCallForRescueManager
{
	speak "Player.Manager_Player.Manager_CallForRescue01" noscene //Come on, let me out!  I can give you a hand!
	speak "Player.Manager_CallForRescue02" noscene  //Come on, let me out!  I can help!
	speak "Player.Manager_CallForRescue03" noscene  //I'm trapped in here, let me out!
}
Rule L4D1PlayerCallForRescueManager
{
	criteria ConceptCallForRescue IsManager IsTalk IsTalkManager IsWorldTalkManager HasNotCalledForRescue
	ApplyContext "CalledForRescue:1:5"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1PlayerCallForRescueManager
}

{
	scene "scenes/Manager/DLC2M1GunEnd01.vcd"  //The fire's out!
	scene "scenes/Manager/DLC2M1GunEnd02.vcd"  //Let's get across that bridge!
	scene "scenes/Manager/DLC2M1GunEnd03.vcd"  //The fire's out! Let's get across that bridge!
}

{
	criteria ConceptHowitzerBurnEnd00 IsManager NotCrash01ThroughBridge AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival
	Response HowitzerBurnEnd00Manager
}

Response L4D1crashHowitzerNagManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/DLC2M1GunNag02.vcd"  //Someone needs to fire that big ass gun.
}

{
	criteria ConceptTalkIdle IsManager IsNotCoughing NotInCombat IsTalk IsTalkManager NotHowitzerFired IsHowitzerSeen ChanceToFire80Percent IsWorldTalkManager IsNotSpeakingWeight0 AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival _auto_NotTimerLockA _auto_NotTimerLockManager
	ApplyContext "_auto_TimerLockA:1:15,_auto_TimerLockManager:1:30"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1crashHowitzerNagManager
}

Response L4D1HowitzerFiredManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/Hurrah03.vcd"  //Hell yeah.
	scene "scenes/Manager/Hurrah14.vcd"  //YEAH!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Hurrah15.vcd"  //YEAH WOO!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Taunt03.vcd"  //Yeah, baby, Yeah!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Taunt04.vcd"  //Alllright!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Taunt06.vcd"  //Helll yeah, Hell yeah!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Taunt07.vcd"  //[loud, evil laugh]
	scene "scenes/Manager/Taunt08.vcd"  //[loud, evil laugh]
	scene "scenes/Manager/Taunt09.vcd"  //[loud, evil laugh]
	scene "scenes/Manager/Taunt10.vcd"  //[loud, evil laugh]
}
Rule L4D1HowitzerFiredManager
{
	criteria ConceptHowitzerFiredResponse IsManager ChanceToFire50Percent AutoIsNotScavenge
	Response L4D1HowitzerFiredManager
}

	scene "scenes/Manager/Swears07.vcd" predelay "0.1,0.7" //Shit shit shit.

Rule SurvivorSpottedAmmoAutoManager
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerSpotWeapon IsNotCoughing IsAmmo IsManager IsTalk IsTalkManager IsSmartLookAuto IsNotInSafeSpot IsNotAlone IsNotSaidSpotAmmo IsNotSaidSpot IsWorldTalkManager IsNotSpeakingWeight0
	ApplyContext "SaidSpotAmmo:1:5,SaidSpot:1:20"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response SurvivorSpottedAmmoManager
}

Rule SurvivorSpottedAmmo2Manager
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerSpotAmmo IsNotCoughing IsManager IsTalk IsTalkManager IsNotInSafeSpot IsNotAlone IsWorldTalkManager _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	Response SurvivorSpottedAmmoManager
}

{
	scene "scenes/Manager/AnswerReady01.vcd"  //Ready!
	scene "scenes/Manager/AnswerReady02.vcd"  //Let's do it!
	scene "scenes/Manager/AnswerReady04.vcd"  //Come on, let's do it!
}

{
	criteria ConceptBotMovingToBattleStation IsNotCoughing IsManager IsTalk IsTalkManager IsSaidCreshendoStartNear IsNotSaidBattleStations IsWorldTalkManager IsNotSpeakingWeight0 _auto_NotFinaleStarted AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival
	ApplyContext "SaidBattleStations:1:30"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1SurvivorMovingToBattleStationManager
}

	scene "scenes/Manager/DLC1_L4D1Tank04.vcd"  //This is why we put this baby up here!
	scene "scenes/Manager/DLC1_L4D1Tank05.vcd" odds 1 //TWO TANKS!
}

{
	criteria ConceptPlayerWarnSpecial IsSpecialTypeTank IsNotCoughing IsManager IsTalk IsTalkManager IsWorldTalkManager IsNotIncapacitated Isc6m3_port IsNotSpeakingWeight0 IsNotVersus IsNotSurvival _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	ApplyContext "SaidTankWarn:1:20,SaidTankWarn2:1:60"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1SpottedTankManager
}

	Response L4D1EmphaticArriveRunManager
}

Response L4D1PlayerAlertGiveItemManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/AlertGiveItem01.vcd"  //Here take this.
	scene "scenes/Manager/AlertGiveItem02.vcd"  //Here, I got something for you.
	scene "scenes/Manager/AlertGiveItem03.vcd"  //Take this.
	scene "scenes/Manager/AlertGiveItem04.vcd"  //Go ahead and take this.
	scene "scenes/Manager/AlertGiveItem05.vcd"  //Here man, take this.
	scene "scenes/Manager/AlertGiveItem06.vcd" odds 5 //Take it and you can pay me back later
	scene "scenes/Manager/AlertGiveItem07.vcd" odds 10 //It's not a time to be a hero, just take it
}
Rule L4D1PlayerAlertGiveItemManager
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerAlertGiveItem IsNotCoughing IsManager IsTalk IsTalkManager IsWorldTalkManager
	Response L4D1PlayerAlertGiveItemManager
}

Rule L4D1PlayerFaultFriendlyFireManager
{
	criteria IsFaultConcept IsFaultFriendlyFire IsManager
	ApplyContext "SaidFaultFriendlyFireManager:1:0.1,SaidFaultFriendlyFire:1:0.1,ShotTeammateManager:1:6"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response NoResponse
}

Response L4D1PlayerFriendlyFireManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/FriendlyFire01.vcd"  //Hey, man, that hurt.
	scene "scenes/Manager/FriendlyFire02.vcd"  //AH! Will you knock it off?
	scene "scenes/Manager/FriendlyFire03.vcd"  //Do I look like one of them?
	scene "scenes/Manager/FriendlyFire04.vcd" odds 1 //You know I would appreciate it, IF YOU'D STOP SHOOTING ME.
	scene "scenes/Manager/FriendlyFire05.vcd"  //Watch where you're shooting!
	scene "scenes/Manager/FriendlyFire06.vcd"  //Hey, man, that's not cool.
	scene "scenes/Manager/FriendlyFire07.vcd"  //Man, what the hell, quit shooting me
	scene "scenes/Manager/FriendlyFire08.vcd" odds 5 //Whoa, whoa, don't shoot, it's me!
	scene "scenes/Manager/FriendlyFire09.vcd"  //Ow man ow! Why you shooting me!
	scene "scenes/Manager/FriendlyFire10.vcd" odds 5 //Look at my face, do I look like them?
	scene "scenes/Manager/FriendlyFire11.vcd" odds 5 //Oh what the hell, why you shootin' me
	scene "scenes/Manager/FriendlyFire12.vcd" odds 5 //I'm gonna shoot you back next time
	scene "scenes/Manager/FriendlyFire13.vcd" odds 5 //Ahhh Mother
	scene "scenes/Manager/FriendlyFire14.vcd"  //Whoa, whoa, don't shoot, it's me!
}

{
	criteria ConceptPlayerFriendlyFire IsNotCoughing IsManager IsNotFriendlyFire IsNotIncapacitated IsNotOnThirdStrike IsDamageTypeBullet IsTalk IsTalkManager IsWorldTalkManager IsNotZombiePresentTank
	ApplyContext "FriendlyFire:1:10"
	Response L4D1PlayerFriendlyFireManager
}

Response L4D1SurvivorTauntResponseManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/Hurrah01.vcd"  //Aw riiiight!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Hurrah02.vcd"  //Woo baby, Aw riiiight!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Hurrah03.vcd"  //Hell yeah.
	scene "scenes/Manager/Hurrah14.vcd"  //YEAH!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Hurrah15.vcd"  //YEAH WOO!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Taunt01.vcd"  //That's right!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Taunt02.vcd"  //Woo Hoo, that's right!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Taunt03.vcd"  //Yeah, baby, Yeah!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Taunt04.vcd"  //Alllright!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Taunt05.vcd" odds 5 //Oh yeah, who's your momma, who's your daddy
	scene "scenes/Manager/Taunt06.vcd"  //Helll yeah, Hell yeah!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Taunt07.vcd"  //[loud, evil laugh]
	scene "scenes/Manager/Taunt08.vcd"  //[loud, evil laugh]
	scene "scenes/Manager/Taunt09.vcd"  //[loud, evil laugh]
	scene "scenes/Manager/Taunt10.vcd"  //[loud, evil laugh]
}

{
	criteria ConceptPlayerTaunt IsSurvivor IsNotSpeaking IsNotCoughing IsManager IsTalk IsTalkManager IsWorldTalkManager //IsNotVersus
	Response L4D1SurvivorTauntResponseManager
}

Response SurvivorJockeyHurtMajorManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/GettingRevived06.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -1.154 //[groan2]
	scene "scenes/Manager/Help01.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -0.891 //Help!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Help05.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -1.117 //Help me!
	scene "scenes/Manager/HurtCritical02.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -0.590 //[Pain noise - loud major pain]
	scene "scenes/Manager/HurtCritical04.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -0.727 //[Pain noise - loud major pain]
	scene "scenes/Manager/HurtMajor01.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -0.867 //[Pain noise - huh]
	scene "scenes/Manager/HurtMajor02.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -0.982 //[Pain noise - ahh]
	scene "scenes/Manager/ScreamWhilePounced02.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -3.232 //GET IT GET IT OFF GET IT OFF!
	scene "scenes/Manager/ScreamWhilePounced03.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -4.019 //GET IT GET IT OFF GET IT OFF!
}
Rule SurvivorJockeyHurtMajorManager
{
	criteria IsSurvivor InPain IsMajorPain IsManager IsTalk IsTalkManager SubjectIsJockey IsNotSaidBeenJockeyedManager IsWorldTalkManager IsBeingJockeyed
	ApplyContext "SaidBeenJockeyedManager:1:6,TalkManager:1:6"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response SurvivorJockeyHurtMajorManager
}

Response L4D1PlayerHelpIncappedManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/Help01.vcd"  //Help!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Help02.vcd"  //I need some help over here!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Help03.vcd"  //Need a little help over here!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Help04.vcd"  //Dammit, I need some help!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Help05.vcd"  //Help me!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Help06.vcd"  //Help!
}
Rule L4D1PlayerHelpIncappedManager
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerHelp IsManager IsNotCoughing IsTalk IsTalkManager IsIncappedStarted IsIncapacitated NotCalledForHelpRecently IsWorldTalkManager
	ApplyContext "CalledForHelp:1:7.5"
	Response L4D1PlayerHelpIncappedManager
}

Response L4D1PlayerHelpIncappedBleedingManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/Help07.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 -1.196 //I'm in trouble!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Help08.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 -1.587 //I need some help!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Help09.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 -1.573 //Somebody help me!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Help10.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 -2.431 //Can you hear me? I need some help!
}

{
	criteria ConceptPlayerHelp IsManager IsNotCoughing IsTalk IsTalkManager IsIncappedBleeding IsIncapacitated NotCalledForHelpRecently IsWorldTalkManager
	ApplyContext "CalledForHelp:1:15"
	Response L4D1PlayerHelpIncappedBleedingManager
}

Response L4D1PlayerHelpIncappedLethargicManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/Help11.vcd" then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 -4.250 //What part of help do you not understand?  Help!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Dying01.vcd" then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0.1 //Guys! I need help now!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Dying02.vcd" then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0.1 //Yo, I need some help RIGHT NOW!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Dying03.vcd" then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0.1 //Yo, I need help right the hell now!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Dying04.vcd" then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0.1 //I need help right the hell now!
}
Rule L4D1PlayerHelpIncappedLethargicManager
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerHelp IsManager IsNotCoughing IsTalk IsTalkManager IsIncappedLethargic IsIncapacitated NotCalledForHelpRecently IsWorldTalkManager
	ApplyContext "CalledForHelp:1:30"
	Response L4D1PlayerHelpIncappedLethargicManager
}

	scene "scenes/Manager/InsideSafeRoom07.vcd"  //What you waitin' for, let's go help him!

	Response L4D1HelpResponseBillManager
}

{
	scene "scenes/Manager/InsideSafeRoom01.vcd"  //I'm no hero, but we can't just leave 'em out there.
	scene "scenes/Manager/InsideSafeRoom03.vcd"  //Come on, I'd want them to come for me.
	scene "scenes/Manager/InsideSafeRoom05.vcd"  //We cannot leave anyone behind
	scene "scenes/Manager/InsideSafeRoom07.vcd"  //What you waitin' for, let's go help him!
}
Rule L4D1HelpResponseFrancisManager

//AUTOGENERATED BLANK FOR L4D1PlayerRemarkhospital03_path02Manager : ChanceToFire50Percent
Rule AUTOBLANK_L4D1PlayerRemarkhospital03_path02Manager
{

	ApplyContext "Saidhospital03_path02:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response _PlayerInfoRemarkableBlankManager
}

{

	scene "scenes/Manager/FinaleAhead02.vcd"  //We're almost out of here!
}

{
	criteria ConceptPlayerNearFinale IsNotCoughing IsManager IsNotSaidFinaleAhead NotInCombat IsTalk IsTalkManager IsNotIncapacitated IsWorldTalkManager AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival
	ApplyContext "SaidFinaleAhead:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1SurvivorNearFinaleManager
}

{
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReactionNegative01.vcd" //Uh oh.
}

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Response SurvivorNearCheckpointManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/SafeSpotAhead04.vcd"  then any SafeSpotAheadResponse foo:0 -1.504 //Safe house ahead!
	scene "scenes/Manager/SafeSpotAhead05.vcd"  then any SafeSpotAheadResponse foo:0 -1.312 //There's the safe house!
	scene "scenes/Manager/SafeSpotAhead06.vcd"  then any SafeSpotAheadResponse foo:0 0.1 //Safe house!
	scene "scenes/Manager/SafeSpotAhead07.vcd"  then any SafeSpotAheadResponse foo:0 -1.490 //Safe house up ahead!
}
Rule SurvivorNearCheckpointManager
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerNearCheckpoint IsNotCoughing IsManager IsNotSaidSafeSpotAhead IsNotAlone IsNotInCheckpoint IsTalk IsTalkManager IsWorldTalkManager AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival
	ApplyContext "SaidSafeSpotAhead:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response SurvivorNearCheckpointManager
}

Response PlayerHurrahManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/Hurrah05.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -1.154 //We're going to be okay.
	scene "scenes/Manager/Hurrah06.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -2.320 //We're going to be okay.
	scene "scenes/Manager/Hurrah07.vcd"  //Man, I think we're gonna make it.
	scene "scenes/Manager/Hurrah08.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -2.106 //They can't stop us now
	scene "scenes/Manager/Hurrah09.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -1.328 //Nothing can stop us.
	scene "scenes/Manager/Hurrah10.vcd" odds 5 then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -5.196 //Nothing can stop us, do you hear me? Nothing can stop us!
	scene "scenes/Manager/Hurrah11.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -1.708 //We are unstoppable.
	scene "scenes/Manager/Hurrah12.vcd" odds 5 then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -2.989 //That's right, we should call ourselves the unstoppables
	scene "scenes/Manager/Hurrah13.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -3.086 //We are unstoppable.
	scene "scenes/Manager/Hurrah16.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -6.301 //I am bad, yes I am bad, YES I AM! WOO!
}

	scene "scenes/Manager/GoingToDieLight14.vcd"  //[pain noise] Oh man, every damn thing hurts.
	scene "scenes/Manager/GoingToDieLight15.vcd"  //[blows air out through pursed lips] This is some real bullshit right here.
	scene "scenes/Manager/GoingToDieLight17.vcd" odds 3 //Ah. [pain noise] hell, hell.
}

	ApplyContext "IsComplain:1:25"

Response L4D1SurvivorVocalizeGoingToDie3Manager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/GoingToDie22.vcd"  //[pain sound] Dammit.
	scene "scenes/Manager/GoingToDie02.vcd"  //I don't, I don't know if I'm going to make it
	scene "scenes/Manager/GoingToDieLight12.vcd" odds 2 //[quiet pep talk to self]C'mon Louis: you are NOT dyin' here.
	scene "scenes/Manager/GoingToDie05.vcd"  //I really need to get some First Aid.
	scene "scenes/Manager/GoingToDie15.vcd"  //I think I'm dyin'.
	scene "scenes/Manager/GoingToDie07.vcd"  //I don't think I'm gonnna make it.
	scene "scenes/Manager/GoingToDie21.vcd"  //I'm not kidding, we need to find me some First Aid.
	scene "scenes/Manager/GoingToDie23.vcd"  //Ah, I might not make it
	scene "scenes/Manager/GoingToDie20.vcd" odds 2 //I should have stayed in damn the store...
}

{

	ApplyContext "IsComplain:1:25"

	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3GRAVELHILL04.vcd" predelay "1,2" then Any Player.WarnMegaMobc7m201 foo:0 2 //Ahhh... look, the crows alerted the zombies!
	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3GRAVELHILL05.vcd" predelay "1,2" then Any Player.WarnMegaMobc7m201 foo:0 3 //Ahhh... dammit... the crows are bringin' the zombies!
}

	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE07.vcd"  //Don't get off the bridge!
	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE09.vcd"  //Don't worry, I'll be fine! Stay there!
	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE10.vcd"  //Don't get off the bridge!
	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE11.vcd"  //I swear to god I'm coming back!
	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE12.vcd"  //Stay there! I'll be back in two minutes!

	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE16.vcd"  //If I go down, don't come after me!
}

	Response Player.C7M3BridgeLeapManager
}

	scene "scenes/Manager/TakeMolotov03.vcd" odds 2 //Molotovs, hell yeah!
}
Rule L4D1SurvivorPickupMolotovManager
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerPickup IsNotCoughing IsManager IsPickedUpMolotov IsNotSpeaking ChanceToFire30Percent NotPickedUpItem IsNotInSafeSpot IsNotInStartArea IsTalk IsTalkManager IsWorldTalkManager _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	ApplyContext "PickedUpItem:1:30"
	Response L4D1SurvivorPickupMolotovManager
}

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Vocalizer - Rescue
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Response L4D1PlayerGettingRevivedManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/GettingRevived01.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.022 //I'm okay.
	scene "scenes/Manager/GettingRevived02.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.280 //I'm allright.
	scene "scenes/Manager/GettingRevived03.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -2.048 //[groan]
	scene "scenes/Manager/GettingRevived04.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.287 //I don't even know.
	scene "scenes/Manager/GettingRevived05.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -2.278 //Aw hell, I'm bleedin'.
	scene "scenes/Manager/GettingRevived06.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.154 //[groan2]
	scene "scenes/Manager/GettingRevived07.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.046 //I'll make it.
	scene "scenes/Manager/GettingRevived08.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.581 //I'll live.
	scene "scenes/Manager/GettingRevived09.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.846 //I can shake it off.
	scene "scenes/Manager/GettingRevived10.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.086 //Just help me up.
	scene "scenes/Manager/GettingRevived11.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.376 //I ain't done yet.
}
Rule L4D1PlayerGettingRevivedManager
{
	criteria ConceptReviveFriendDown IsNotCoughing IsManager IsTalk IsTalkManager IsWorldTalkManager
	Response L4D1PlayerGettingRevivedManager
}

Response L4D1PlayerHealOtherManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/HealOther01.vcd"  //Let me heal you up.
	scene "scenes/Manager/HealOther02.vcd"  //Hold on, I'm gonna heal you.
	scene "scenes/Manager/HealOther03.vcd"  //Hold up, this'll help.
	scene "scenes/Manager/HealOther04.vcd"  //Hang on, let me fix you up.
	scene "scenes/Manager/HealOther05.vcd"  //This should last you until we're safe.
}
Rule L4D1PlayerHealOtherManager
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerHealingOther IsNotCoughing IsManager IsTalk IsTalkManager IsWorldTalkManager
	ApplyContext "TalkManager:1:5"
	Response L4D1PlayerHealOtherManager
}

Response L4D1PlayerReviveFriendManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriend11.vcd"  //I didn't think you were gettin' back up.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriend12.vcd"  //Don't worry, I gotcha. You're gonna be just fine.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriend18.vcd" odds 1 //I never saw nobody take that much abuse and live! Oughtta start callin' you Jason.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriend19.vcd" odds 1 //I never saw nobody take that much abuse and live! Oughtta start callin' you Hercules.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriend01.vcd"  //I gotcha, I gotcha. Don't worry, I'm not gonna let you die. Come on, up ya go.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriend02.vcd"  //Come on, man, look at me. Focus. You are going to be okay. Let's get moving.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriend03.vcd"  //I gotcha, I gotcha. Don't worry, I'm not gonna let you die. Come on, up ya go.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriend04.vcd"  //Come on, man, look at me. Focus. You are going to be okay. Let's get moving.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriend05.vcd"  //Okay, okay, I'm here, don't worry. Onnne second. I'll get you back on your feet.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriend06.vcd"  //Okay, okay, I'm here, don't worry. Onnne second. I'll get you back on your feet.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriend07.vcd"  //C'mon, okay, break time's over. Let's get you on your feet and back to work.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriend08.vcd"  //I think... Yeah, I think you're okay. Let's get you up so we can keep moving.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriend09.vcd"  //I'm no doctor, but you are *definitely* not dead yet. So come on, let's get you up and moving.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriend10.vcd"  //Okay, okay, I'm here, don't worry. Onnne second. I'll get you back on your feet.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendA01.vcd" then subject ReviveFriendDown foo:0 -0.863 // You okay?
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendA02.vcd" then subject ReviveFriendDown foo:0 -0.848 // How d'ya feel?
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendA03.vcd" then subject ReviveFriendDown foo:0 -0.957 // Can you make it?
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendA04.vcd" then subject ReviveFriendDown foo:0 -0.896 // You gonna make it?
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendA05.vcd" then subject ReviveFriendDown foo:0 -1.184 // How bad are you?
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendA07.vcd" then subject ReviveFriendDown foo:0 -0.832 // How ya doin'?
}
Rule L4D1PlayerReviveFriendManager
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerReviveFriend IsNotCoughing  IsManager IsTalk IsTalkManager IsWorldTalkManager NotInIntenseCombat _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	ApplyContext "TalkManager:1:2"
	Response L4D1PlayerReviveFriendManager
}

Response L4D1PlayerReviveFriendCriticalManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveCriticalFriend01.vcd"  //Oh man, you don't look so good. If we don't get you some first aid , you're not gonna survive another hit like that.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveCriticalFriend02.vcd"  //Ah, ah jesus, you're bleedin' all over the place. If we don't get you some first aid, you're not gonna survive another hit like that.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveCriticalFriend03.vcd"  //I can get you on your feet, but just barely. If we don't get you some first aid, you're not gonna survive another hit like that.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveCriticalFriend04.vcd"  //Okay, come on, stay with me. I can get you moving again, but if we don't find you some first aid, you're not gonna survive another hit like that.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveCriticalFriend05.vcd"  //I can help you up, but, Jesus, you shouldn't even be alive. If we don't find you some first aid, you're not gonna survive another hit like that.
}
Rule L4D1PlayerReviveFriendCriticalManager
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerReviveFriendCritical IsNotCoughing  IsManager IsTalk IsTalkManager IsWorldTalkManager NotInIntenseCombat _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	ApplyContext "TalkManager:1:2"
	Response L4D1PlayerReviveFriendCriticalManager
}

Response L4D1PlayerReviveFriendLoudManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendLoud01.vcd"  //Come on, come on! You're okay!
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendLoud02.vcd"  //Let's get up, let's get up!
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendLoud03.vcd"  //Get up, we gotta go!
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendLoud04.vcd"  //Come on, get up!
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendLoud05.vcd"  //Come on, man, get up!
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendLoud08.vcd"  //Come on, you gotta get up.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendLoud09.vcd"  //Come on now. Get up!
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendLoud11.vcd"  //Get up now, come on!
}

{
	criteria ConceptPlayerReviveFriend IsNotCoughing  IsManager InIntenseCombat IsTalk IsTalkManager IsWorldTalkManager _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	ApplyContext "TalkManager:1:2"
	Response L4D1PlayerReviveFriendLoudManager
}

{
	criteria ConceptPlayerReviveFriend IsNotCoughing IsManager IsZombiePresentTank IsSaidTankWarn2 IsTalk IsTalkManager IsWorldTalkManager _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	ApplyContext "TalkManager:1:2"
	forceweight 30
	Response L4D1PlayerReviveFriendLoudManager
}

Response L4D1PlayerReviveFriendDownFinalManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendB01.vcd"  //Up and at 'em.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendB02.vcd"  //Come on up!
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendB03.vcd"  //Up ya go.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendB04.vcd"  //You'll be okay.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendB05.vcd"  //I got ya.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendB06.vcd"  //Up we go.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendB07.vcd"  //You're fine.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendB08.vcd"  //It doesn't look bad.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendB09.vcd"  //Come on up.
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendB10.vcd"  //Let's move!
	scene "scenes/Manager/ReviveFriendB11.vcd"  //You'll be fine.
}
Rule L4D1PlayerReviveFriendDownFinalManager
{
	criteria ConceptReviveFriendDownFinal IsNotCoughing IsManager IsTalk IsTalkManager IsWorldTalkManager IsNotReviveInterrupt
	Response L4D1PlayerReviveFriendDownFinalManager
}

	scene "scenes/Manager/LedgeSave02.vcd"  //I'm here. I gotcha, man. Grab my hand and we're gonna get you back on solid ground!
	scene "scenes/Manager/LedgeSave03.vcd"  //Don't worry, I gotcha, man. Hang on, hang on. Almost up...
}

	ApplyContext "CXM1Intro:1:0"

Response PlayerShotGasCanManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/Swears05.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Shit.
	scene "scenes/Manager/Swears06.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Ah shit.
	scene "scenes/Manager/Swears07.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Shit shit shit.
	scene "scenes/Manager/Swears12.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Shit.
	scene "scenes/Manager/Swears13.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Ah shit.
	scene "scenes/Manager/Swears16.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //That's some country-ass bullshit.
}

{
	criteria ConceptPlayerShotGasCan IsManager IsNotSaidPlayerShotGasCan IsScavenge
	ApplyContext "SaidPlayerShotGasCan:1:10"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response PlayerShotGasCanManager
}

Response L4D1PlayerCoverMeHealManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/CoverMe01.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Cover me!
	scene "scenes/Manager/CoverMe02.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Cover me!
	scene "scenes/Manager/CoverMe03.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Cover me!
	scene "scenes/Manager/CoverMe04.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Watch my back!
	scene "scenes/Manager/CoverMe05.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Watch my back!
	scene "scenes/Manager/CoverMe06.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Cover me, I'm healing!
	scene "scenes/Manager/CoverMe07.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Everybody stop a sec, I gotta heal.
	scene "scenes/Manager/CoverMe08.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Wait up while I heal.
	scene "scenes/Manager/CoverMe09.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Hold up, I gotta heal.
	scene "scenes/Manager/CoverMe10.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Cover me whille I heal.
}
Rule L4D1PlayerCoverMeHealManager
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerHealing IsNotCoughing IsManager IsNotAskedForCover IsTalk IsTalkManager IsNotAlone IsWorldTalkManager
	ApplyContext "AskForCover:1:30"
	Response L4D1PlayerCoverMeHealManager
}

	scene "scenes/Manager/LostCall03.vcd"  //Where is everyone?
	scene "scenes/Manager/LostCall04.vcd"  //Is anyone there?
	scene "scenes/Manager/LostCall05.vcd"  //Where'd everyone get to?
	scene "scenes/Manager/LostCall06.vcd"  //Can anyone hear me?
}

{
	criteria ConceptTalkIdle IsManager IsClosestSurvivorFar3000 IsNotAlone IsNotSaidPlayerLostCall _auto_NotNoLostCall IsNotSpeakingWeight0
	ApplyContext "SaidPlayerLostCall:1:50"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response AutoPlayerLostCallManager
}

Response SurvivorSpottedSMGManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/TakeSubMachineGun02.vcd"  //A machinegun. [to self]
}

Rule SurvivorSpottedSMGManager
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerSpotWeapon IsNotCoughing IsManager IsTalk IsTalkManager IsNotSaidSomeoneDied IsNotSmartLookAuto IsSMG IsWorldTalkManager _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	ApplyContext "SaidSpotWeapons:1:5,SaidSpot:1:20"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response SurvivorSpottedSMGManager
}

{
	criteria ConceptPlayerSpotWeapon IsNotCoughing IsManager IsTalk IsTalkManager IsNotSaidSomeoneDied IsSmartLookAuto IsNotInSafeSpot IsNotAlone IsNotSaidSpotWeapons IsNotSaidSpot IsSMG IsWorldTalkManager IsNotSpeakingWeight0 _auto_NotSpottedVehicle

	ApplyContext "RemarkedC14M2Gate:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1RemarkC14M2GateManager
}

Response L4D1RemarkC14M2GateBillManager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/C6DLC3HARBORBLOCKED02.vcd"  then namvet C14M2Gate2 foo:0 -1.360 //You sure this is the right way?
}

{
	criteria ConceptRemark IsManager IsC14M2Gate IsNotRemarkedC14M2Gate NotInCombat IsTalk IsTalkManager IsWorldTalkManager IsSubjectNear300 IsNamVetAlive IsNamVetNear400 ChanceToFire50Percent AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival IsNotSpeakingWeight0
	ApplyContext "RemarkedC14M2Gate:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1RemarkC14M2GateBillManager
}

Response L4D1SurvivorFinalVehicleSpottedBoatC14M2Manager
{
	scene "scenes/Manager/ArriveBoatInitial01.vcd" predelay "12" then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 -14.112 //The boat's here! Let's go!
	scene "scenes/Manager/ArriveBoatInitial02.vcd" predelay "12" then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 -14.083 //Our boat's here! Let's go!
}
Rule L4D1SurvivorFinalVehicleSpottedBoatC14M2Manager
{
	criteria ConceptFinalVehicleSpotted IsManager IsLastStand2 _auto_IsFinaleStarted
	ApplyContext "_auto_TimerLockA:1:10,_auto_TimerLockManager:1:30,_auto_Finale:2:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1SurvivorFinalVehicleSpottedBoatC14M2Manager
}

Rule L4D1SurvivorFinalVehicleBoatC14M2Manager
{
	criteria ConceptGetToVehicle IsManager IsLastStand2 IsNotCoughing IsNotIncapacitated IsNotAlone NoOneInSafeSpot IsTalk AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival IsNotInRescueVehicle _auto_IsEscapeReady _auto_NotTimerLockA _auto_NotTimerLockManager IsNotSpeakingWeight0
	ApplyContext "_auto_TimerLockA:1:10,_auto_TimerLockManager:1:30"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1SurvivorFinalVehicleBoatManager
}

{
	criteria ConceptGetToVehicle IsManager IsLastStand2 IsNotCoughing IsNotIncapacitated IsNotAlone IsTalk AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival IsInRescueVehicle _auto_IsEscapeReady _auto_NotTimerLockA _auto_NotTimerLockManager IsNotSpeakingWeight0

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Generic rules to keep track of contexts for all maps (Unless there's a seperate rule for special cases)
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Rule SafeRoomStartManager
{
	criteria ConceptTalkIdle IsManager IsInStartArea AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival _auto_NotSafeRoomStart
	ApplyContext "Talk:1:45,_auto_SafeRoomStart:1:0,_auto_SafeRoomQuiet:1:5"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response NoResponse
}

Rule IntroEndManager
{
	criteria ConceptIntroEnd IsManager FromIsManager IsNotSaidLeavingSafeArea AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival
	ApplyContext "Talk:0:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response NoResponse
}

Rule LeavingSafeAreaManager
{
	criteria ConceptSurvivorLeavingCheckpoint IsManager IsNotSaidLeavingSafeArea AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival
	ApplyContext "SaidLeavingSafeArea:1:0,Talk:0:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response NoResponse
}

Rule LeavingSafeRoomManager
{
	criteria ConceptSurvivorLeavingInitialCheckpoint IsManager IsNotSaidLeavingSafeArea
	ApplyContext "SaidLeavingSafeArea:1:0,Talk:0:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response NoResponse
}

Rule FinaleTriggeredManager
{
	criteria ConceptFinaleTriggered IsManager IsTriggeredByManager AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival _auto_NotFinaleStarted
	ApplyContext "_auto_Finale:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response NoResponse
}

Rule FinalVehicleSpottedManager
{
	criteria ConceptFinalVehicleSpotted IsManager _auto_IsFinaleStarted _auto_NotEscapeReady
	ApplyContext "_auto_Finale:2:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response NoResponse
}

Rule FinalVehicleArrivedManager
{
	criteria ConceptFinalVehicleArrived IsManager _auto_HasSpottedVehicle _auto_NotEscapeReady
	ApplyContext "_auto_Escape:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
